Roboute Guilliman.name: Roboute Guilliman

unit.name: Primarch of the XIII (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit is within 6" of this model, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit and you can re-roll Battle-shock and Leadership tests taken for that unit.

unit.name: Master of Battle
unit.description: At the start of your Command phase , after you have selected your Oath of Moment target, select a second enemy unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, if your Oath of Moment target is destroyed , that second enemy unit becomes your Oath of Moment target until you select a new one.

unit.name: Supreme Strategist
unit.description: Once per battle round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

unit.name: Author of the Codex
unit.description: At the Start of your Command phase , select two Author of the Codex abilities (see left). Until the start of your next Command phase, this model has those abilities. Ultramarines Bodyguard: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY units, this model has the Lone Operative ability. Armour of Fate: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase: on a 3+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models, with 6 wounds remaining.

default_wargear: 1 Roboute Guilliman – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Hand of Dominion; Emperor’s Sword.

Marneus Calgar.name: Marneus Calgar

unit.name: Inspiring Leader
unit.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains a MARNEUS CALGAR model, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back Master Tactician: At the start of your Command phase , if this unit’s Marneus Calgar model is your WARLORD and is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP. Honour Guard of Macragge: While this unit contains one or more Victrix Honour Guard models, this unit’s MARNEUS CALGAR model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Marneus Calgar.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Aggressor Squad Assault Intercessor Squad Bladeguard Veteran Squad Company Heroes Eradicator Squad Heavy Intercessor Squad Infernus Squad Intercessor Squad Sternguard Veteran Squad Tactical Squad Victrix Honour Guard Crusader Squad Sternguard Veteran Squad Sword Brethren Squad Inner Circle Companions Deathwatch Veterans Decimus Kill Team Fortis Kill Team Indomitor Kill Team Assault Squad Command Squad Crusader Squad (Legendary) Vanguard Veteran Squad Wolf Guard

default_wargear: 1 Marneus Calgar – EPIC HERO 2 Victrix Honour Guard Marneus Calgar is equipped with: Gauntlets of Ultramar. Every Victrix Honour Guard is equipped with: Victrix power sword.

Captain in Gravis Armour.name: Captain in Gravis Armour

ranged.name: Master-crafted heavy bolt rifle assault heavy

unit.name: Rites of Battle
unit.description: Once per battle round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP. Refuse to Yield: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Captain in Gravis Armour.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Aggressor Squad Eradicator Squad Heavy Intercessor Squad Indomitor Kill Team
led_by: Aggressor Squad Eradicator Squad Heavy Intercessor Squad Indomitor Kill Team
can_lead: Aggressor Squad Eradicator Squad Heavy Intercessor Squad Indomitor Kill Team
default_wargear: 1 Captain in Gravis Armour This model is equipped with: master-crafted heavy bolt rifle; master-crafted power weapon.

Lieutenant.name: Lieutenant

unit.name: Tactical Precision
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. Target Priority: This model’s unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back .

unit.name: Storm Shield
unit.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save .

Lieutenant.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Assault Intercessor Squad Bladeguard Veteran Squad Company Heroes Hellblaster Squad Infernus Squad Intercessor Squad Sternguard Veteran Squad Tactical Squad Crusader Squad Sternguard Veteran Squad Sword Brethren Squad Inner Circle Companions Deathwatch Veterans Decimus Kill Team Fortis Kill Team Assault Squad Command Squad Crusader Squad (Legendary) Vanguard Veteran Squad Wolf Guard You can attach this model to a unit it can lead even if one CAPTAIN or CHAPTER MASTER model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths .

Ballistus Dreadnought.name: Ballistus Dreadnought

ranged.name: Twin storm bolter rapid fire 2 twin-linked

unit.name: Ballistus Strike
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that is not Below Half-strength , you can re-roll the Hit roll .

default_wargear: 1 Ballistus Dreadnought This model is equipped with: Ballistus missile launcher; Ballistus lascannon; twin storm bolter; armoured feet.

Redemptor Dreadnought.name: Redemptor Dreadnought

ranged.name: Macro plasma incinerator – supercharge blast hazardous
Twin fragstorm grenade launcher blast twin-linked
Twin storm bolter rapid fire 2 twin-linked

unit.name: Duty Eternal
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

default_wargear: 1 Redemptor Dreadnought This model is equipped with: Twin fragstorm grenade launcher; heavy flamer; heavy onslaught gatling cannon; Redemptor fist.

Brutalis Dreadnought.name: Brutalis Dreadnought

ranged.name: Twin heavy bolter sustained hits 1 twin-linked

unit.name: Brutalis Charge
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds ; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

default_wargear: 1 Brutalis Dreadnought This model is equipped with: twin Icarus ironhail heavy stubber; twin heavy bolter; Brutalis bolt rifles; Brutalis fists.

Intercessor Squad.name: Intercessor Squad

ranged.name: Hand flamer ignores cover pistol torrent

unit.name: Objective Secured
unit.description: If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase and this unit is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. Target Elimination: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of bolt rifles equipped by models in this unit and you can only select one enemy unit as the target of all of this unit’s attacks.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Adrax Agatone Ancient Apothecary Captain Captain Titus Chaplain Chief Librarian Tigurius Judiciar Kor’sarro Khan Librarian Lieutenant Marneus Calgar Marneus Calgar in Armour of Antilochus Techmarine Uriel Ventris Inquisitor Inquisitor Coteaz Inquisitor Draxus Inquisitor Greyfax Castellan Chaplain Grimaldus Emperor’s Champion High Marshal Helbrecht Marshal Blood Angels Captain Chaplain Kastiel Judiciar Xacharus Sanguinary Priest Asmodai Azrael Ezekiel Lazarus Brother Corbulo Captain Tycho Gabriel Seth Inquisitor Eisenhorn Inquisitor In Terminator Armour Inquisitor Ostromandeus Primaris Company Champion

default_wargear: 1 Intercessor Sergeant 4-9 Intercessors Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; bolt rifle; close combat weapon.

Assault Intercessor Squad.name: Assault Intercessor Squad

ranged.name: Hand flamer ignores cover pistol torrent

unit.name: Shock Assault
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit targets an enemy unit with a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker , you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Adrax Agatone Ancient Apothecary Captain Captain Sicarius Captain Titus Chaplain Chief Librarian Tigurius Judiciar Kor’sarro Khan Librarian Lieutenant Marneus Calgar Marneus Calgar in Armour of Antilochus Techmarine Uriel Ventris Vulkan He’stan Inquisitor Inquisitor Coteaz Inquisitor Draxus Inquisitor Greyfax Castellan Chaplain Grimaldus Emperor’s Champion High Marshal Helbrecht Marshal Blood Angels Captain Chaplain Kastiel Judiciar Xacharus Sanguinary Priest Asmodai Azrael Ezekiel Lazarus Brother Corbulo Captain Tycho Gabriel Seth Inquisitor Eisenhorn Inquisitor In Terminator Armour Inquisitor Ostromandeus Primaris Company Champion

Infernus Squad.name: Infernus Squad

unit.name: Incendiary Terror
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, you can select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a pyreblaster. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 1 from that test.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Adrax Agatone Ancient Apothecary Captain Captain Titus Chaplain Judiciar Librarian Lieutenant Marneus Calgar Marneus Calgar in Armour of Antilochus Vulkan He’stan Castellan Chaplain Grimaldus Marshal Blood Angels Captain Chaplain Kastiel Judiciar Xacharus Sanguinary Priest Asmodai Azrael Ezekiel Lazarus Brother Corbulo Captain Tycho Gabriel Seth Primaris Company Champion

default_wargear: 1 Infernus Sergeant 4-9 Infernus Marines Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; pyreblaster; close combat weapon.

Vindicator.name: Vindicator

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Siege Shield
unit.description: When making ranged attacks with its demolisher cannon, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

default_wargear: 1 Vindicator This model is equipped with: demolisher cannon; armoured tracks.

Gladiator Lancer.name: Gladiator Lancer

unit.name: Aquilon Optics
unit.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll , you can re-roll one Wound roll and you can re-roll one Damage roll when resolving those attacks.

default_wargear: 1 Gladiator Lancer This model is equipped with: Lancer laser destroyer; 2 storm bolters; armoured hull.

Terminator Squad.name: Terminator Squad

unit.name: Teleport Homer
unit.description: At the start of the battle, you can set up one Teleport Homer token for this unit anywhere on the battlefield that is not in your opponent’s deployment zone. If you do, once per battle, you can target this unit with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP, but when resolving that Stratagem, you must set this unit up within 3" of that token and not within 9" of any enemy models. That token is then removed. Fury of the First: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target , add 1 to the Hit roll .

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Ancient In Terminator Armour Caanok Var Captain In Terminator Armour Chaplain In Terminator Armour Darnath Lysander Librarian In Terminator Armour Marneus Calgar in Armour of Antilochus Belial Deathwing Strikemaster Wolf Guard Battle Leader In Terminator Armour

default_wargear: 1 Terminator Sergeant 4-9 Terminators Every model is equipped with: storm bolter; power fist.

Stormraven Gunship.name: Stormraven Gunship

ranged.name: Twin heavy bolter sustained hits 1 twin-linked
Twin heavy plasma cannon – standard blast twin-linked
Twin heavy plasma cannon – supercharge blast hazardous twin-linked

unit.name: Armoured Resilience
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

default_wargear: 1 Stormraven Gunship This model is equipped with: 2 stormstrike missile launchers; twin assault cannon; typhoon missile launcher; armoured hull.
Stormraven Gunship.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY models and 1 DREADNOUGHT model. Each JUMP PACK , WULFEN , GRAVIS or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION model takes up the space of 3 models.

Scout Squad.name: Scout Squad

unit.name: Guerrilla Tactics
unit.description: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is more than 6" away from all enemy models, you can remove this unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves .

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Captain In Phobos Armour Sergeant Telion

default_wargear: 1 Scout Sergeant 4-9 Scouts Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

Gladiator Reaper.name: Gladiator Reaper

unit.name: Rotating Death
unit.description: This model’s twin heavy onslaught gatling cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability when targeting INFANTRY units.

default_wargear: 1 Gladiator Reaper This model is equipped with: 2 tempest bolters; twin heavy onslaught gatling cannon; armoured hull.
